segments.text: Hello , is that Susan who applied for an accountant in our company through the phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , speaking . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am the HR manager of the ABC Company . You are on the list of interviewees . Would you please come over to have an interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'd love to . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
